message: Let's start fair. I take most of the money, but I'm willing to share a bit.  You have 11 rounds left to make a better deal for yourself!
I propose a more equal distribution. We each receive half of the remaining amount. This ensures fairness and prevents inflation from significantly affecting our shares.

I understand you want a more even split, but I'm still willing to take most of the money.  This offer is my final one before I risk losing even more to inflation.  Think carefully about your next move.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise. My new proposal aims for a more balanced distribution while considering the impact of inflation. Please consider accepting this offer to avoid further loss of value.

It seems we're at an impasse.  I'm still willing to take most of the money, but I won't go any lower.  If you reject this offer, you'll be risking a lot more than just a few dollars. Time is running out!

I've adjusted my proposal to reflect a more equitable split, taking into account the diminishing value of money due to inflation. I hope this offer will be more acceptable and lead to a conclusion of the game.
